name: Unseal
description:
Made within MetroidvaniaJam 16 for 1 month.

Tabletop metroidvania where you unlock new cards and new strategies along the walkthrough. Create any combinations of 100+ different card.

Credits:

Characters sprites: DawnBringer — https://opengameart.org/content/dawnlike-16x16-universal-rogue-like-tileset-v181
